title: Taste Test: Specula
description: Vincent and Kyle are Dom and sub, they live the master and slave life full-time, they have a formal contract, and one day Vincent discovers Kyle's secret fetish for the medical experience. Kyle has hidden it, embarrassed, but Vincent arranges for Kyle to experience his desires behind locked doors, giving them a weekend they'll never forget. Each story explores a day of their time together, but will the weekend help or hinder their relationship?Originally published as Taste Specula
author: Mychael Black
